definition: Sha Tin town in New Territories, Hong Kong
granule/hoarse/raspy/sand/powder/CL:粒[li4]/abbr. for Tsar or Tsarist Russia
surname Sha
surname Tian
field/farm/CL:片[pian4]

sentences.english: I don't know anyone in Sha Tin.
sentences.chinese: 在沙田，我一个人都不认识。

sentences.english: Then the direction of ecological researches on Shatian pomelo is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 最后提出了今后沙田柚生态研究的方向。

sentences.english: I am a retired principal, and now a District Board Councillor in Shatin.
sentences.chinese: 本人为退休小学校长，现任沙田区全职区议员。

sentences.english: Note : (1) Driving tests for articulated vehicle are available at Shatin Centre only.
sentences.chinese: 挂接式车辆的驾驶考试只在沙田试场举行。

sentences.english: We should make full use of the Mous of beach land.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该充分利用好这几亩沙田。

sentences.english: This project is located in Tai Wai, which is the historical center of Sha Tin.
sentences.chinese: 本项目位于沙田的历史中心大围。

sentences.english: Me my dad driving towards TaiPo from Shatin.
sentences.chinese: 我和我爸爸从沙田开车往大埔。

sentences.english: We consider Sha Tin as a luxurious place to hang out.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为沙田是一个奢侈的聚会娱乐地方。

sentences.english: Apprentice jockey Willy Kan Wai-yue was killed in a fall at Sha Tin racecourse yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 见习骑师简慧榆于昨日在沙田马场堕马丧生。

sentences.english: Small-class teaching could be implemented in Sha Tin on a trial basis.
sentences.chinese: 可以在沙田试行小班教学。

sentences.english: The pets got on the bus to Sha Tin.
sentences.chinese: 两只宠物上了那架去沙田的公车。

sentences.english: The preliminary performance of Shatianyou (Citrus grandis Osbeck) on 4 types of trifoliate orange (Poncirus trifoliata Raf. )rootstock were recorded.
sentences.chinese: 比较了4个枳选系作沙田柚砧木的早期表现。

sentences.english: Today I go to shatin park. Many children play with me.
sentences.chinese: 今天我去了沙田公园玩，有很多人跟我做朋友。

sentences.english: The influences of different preserving conditions on the pollen germination in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同贮藏条件对沙田柚花粉萌发的影响。

sentences.english: Two large-scale exhibitions were staged in Sha Tin Town Hall.
sentences.chinese: 年内，沙田大会堂举行了两个大型展览。
